selected_skills.name: interpret_diagram_for_geometry
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the diagram and extract geometric information necessary to determine the value of the square.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract relevant geometric data from the diagram.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform any necessary calculations to determine the value of the square once the relevant geometric information is extracted.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the extracted geometric data to form an expression and calculate the numeric value.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as required.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated numeric value to produce a formatted answer string.
